author: Honore de Balzac
message: The smallest flower is a thought, a life answering to some feature of the Great Whole, of whom they have a persistent intuition.
title: Thought of the day

author: Jacob Braude
message: Consider how hard it is to change yourself and you'll understand what little chance you have in trying to change others.
title: Thought of the day

author: Vince Lombardi
message: If you'll not settle for anything less than your best, you will be amazed at what you can accomplish in your lives.
title: Thought of the day

author: Oliver Holmes
message: What lies behind us and what lies before us are small matters compared to what lies within us.
title: Thought of the day
